article_title: 'Halbig' Critics Struggle With The ACA's Legislative History

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: A closer look at the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act's legislative history turns Greg Sargent’s anti-Halbig conclusion on its head.
